body_html:
@vrv @terrytangyuan ,

Thanks for the helps, however it does not work..Same error appears

I added

allow_soft_placement = True,

to Line 71 in /anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/run_config.py

and then added

from tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.estimators import run_config 
config_  = run_config.RunConfig()
classifier = learn.TensorFlowEstimator(model_fn=my_model, n_classes=3, config=config_)

to line 39 in file ~/tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/skflow/multiple_gpu.py

body:
@vrv @terrytangyuan ,

Thanks for the helps, however it does not work..Same error appears

I added 

```
allow_soft_placement = True, 
```

to Line 71 in `/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/run_config.py` 

and then added

```
from tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.estimators import run_config 
config_  = run_config.RunConfig()
classifier = learn.TensorFlowEstimator(model_fn=my_model, n_classes=3, config=config_)
```

to line 39 in file `~/tensorflow/tensorflow/examples/skflow/multiple_gpu.py`
